location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ARABIA: GENERAL MAP SHOWING COMMUNICATIONS, LANDING GROUNDS ETC.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on colour paper.Dimensions: 697 x 742mm, on sheet 767 x 808mm.

mods.abstract: Map showing aerodromes, landing grounds and seaplane anchorages in the Arabian Peninsula. The map also indicates hydrology, settlements, and boundaries.Includes the following printing statement: 'Produced under the Superintendence of Captain J.A. Edgell, O.B.E., R.N., Hydrographer.' Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
